titleStmt.title: An answer to Sir Peter Leicester's Addenda, or, Some things to be added in his Answer to Sir Thomas Mainwarings book written by the said Sir Thomas Mainwaring.
titleStmt.author: Mainwaring, Thomas, Sir, 1623-1689.

notesStmt.note: In respect to the alleged illegitimacy of Amicia Mainwaring, daughter of Hugh Cybeliok, Earl of Chester.
This item appears at reel 48:29 as Wing A3380 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.), and at reel 673:9 as Wing (2nd ed.) M298.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
